info.title: HMPPS Prisoner Finance API - ALPHA
info.description:
API for retrieving and managing transactions and balance information related to prisoner finance.

## Authentication
This API uses **OAuth2 with JWTs**. Pass your JWT in the `Authorization` header using the `Bearer` scheme.
**Important:** This service is designed for client tokens only; user tokens should not be used.

## Authorization
Access to API endpoints is controlled by roles. The required roles are documented with each endpoint.
Integrations should request one of the following roles based on their needs:

* `ROLE_PRISONER_FINANCE__RO`: Grants **read-only access** (e.g., retrieving transactions, balances).
* `ROLE_PRISONER_FINANCE__RW`: Grants **read/write access** (e.g., creating transactions, adding amendments).
* `ROLE_PRISONER_FINANCE_SYNC__RW`: Grants **read/write access** to the NOMIS sync endpoints.

tags.description: Endpoints exclusively for NOMIS synchronization. Do not use for other client integrations.

post.description:
Transactions that have not been posted before will be created.
      Those that have already been posted and can be identified will be updated with metadata only.
      If the core details of a transaction have changed, the ledger will need to reverse the original transaction and post a new one.

200.description: Offender transaction metadata successfully updated or processed with no new creations.

401.description: Unauthorized - requires a valid OAuth2 token

500.description: Internal Server Error - An unexpected error occurred.

post.description:
General ledger transactions that have not been posted before will be created.
      Those that have already been posted and can be identified will be updated with metadata only.
      If the core details of a transaction have changed, the ledger will need to reverse the original transaction and post a new one.

200.description: General ledger transaction metadata successfully updated or processed with no new creations.

401.description: Unauthorized - requires a valid OAuth2 token

500.description: Internal Server Error - An unexpected error occurred.

post.description: Receives and synchronizes a batch of general ledger account balances from the source system.

201.description: Balances successfully received and processed, implying new entries or a full overwrite.

200.description: Balances successfully updated or processed with no new creations, implying partial updates or reconciliation.

401.description: Unauthorized - requires a valid OAuth2 token

500.description: Internal Server Error - An unexpected error occurred.

entrySequence.description: The sequence number for this specific general ledger entry.

postingType.description: Indicates whether the entry is a Debit (DR) or Credit (CR).

amount.description: The monetary amount of the general ledger entry.

OffenderTransaction.description: Represents a single offender transaction entry, including related general ledger entries.

entrySequence.description: The sequence number for this specific offender transaction entry.

offenderId.description: The internal ID of the offender.

offenderDisplayId.description: The display ID for the offender.

offenderBookingId.description: The booking ID of the offender transaction.

subAccountType.description: The sub-account type (e.g., REG, SPND, SAV).

type.description: The type of transaction (e.g., OT, DISCP).

description.description: A description of the transaction entry.

amount.description: The monetary amount of the transaction entry.

reference.description: An optional reference number for the transaction.

generalLedgerEntries.description: A list of general ledger entries associated with this offender transaction.

SyncOffenderTransactionRequest.description: Request body for synchronizing an offender financial transaction.

transactionId.description: The unique ID of the transaction in NOMIS.

requestId.description: A unique identifier for this synchronization request. This can be used for idempotency or tracing.

caseloadId.description: The ID of the caseload associated with this transaction.

transactionTimestamp.description: The timestamp when this transaction occurred (ISO 8601 format).

createdAt.description: The date and time the transaction was created.

createdBy.description: The user id of the person who created the transaction.

createdByDisplayName.description: The display name of the person who created the transaction.

lastModifiedAt.description: The date and time the transaction was last modified. Only provided if the transaction has been modified since creation.

lastModifiedBy.description: The user id of the person who last modified the transaction. Required if lastModifiedAt has been supplied.

lastModifiedByDisplayName.description: The displayable name of the person who last modified the transaction. Required if lastModifiedAt has been supplied.

offenderTransactions.description: A list of individual entries that comprise this offender transaction.

SyncTransactionReceipt.description: Receipt details for a synchronized transaction, indicating the outcome of the operation.

transactionId.description: The unique ID of the transaction in NOMIS. This is reflected back for mapping.

requestId.description: The unique identifier of the **current synchronization request**. This Id was provided by the client as the idempotency key.

synchronizedTransactionId.description: The unique UUID generated by the **finance system** for the synchronized transaction. This is the internal identifier for the created or updated record.

action.description: The action taken on the transaction by the finance system during synchronization.

SyncGeneralLedgerTransactionRequest.description: Request body for synchronizing general ledger transactions. Please note these are for non-offender accounts only.

transactionId.description: The unique identifier for the general ledger transaction.

requestId.description: A unique identifier for this synchronization request. This can be used for idempotency or tracing.

description.description: A description of the general ledger transaction.

reference.description: An optional reference number for the transaction.

caseloadId.description: The ID of the caseload associated with the transaction.

transactionTimestamp.description: The full timestamp of the transaction (ISO 8601).

createdAt.description: The date and time the transaction was created.

createdBy.description: The user ID of the person who created the transaction in the source system.

createdByDisplayName.description: The display name of the person who created the transaction.

lastModifiedAt.description: The date and time the transaction was last modified. Only provided if the transaction has been modified since creation. (ISO 8601 format with offset)

lastModifiedBy.description: The user ID of the person who last modified the transaction. Required if lastModifiedAt has been supplied.

lastModifiedByDisplayName.description: The displayable name of the person who last modified the transaction. Required if lastModifiedAt has been supplied.

generalLedgerEntries.description: A list of general ledger entries associated with this general ledger transaction.

GeneralLedgerAccountBalance.description: Details for a single general ledger account balance.

code.description: A numerical code associated with the account, often representing its type or category.

name.description: The human-readable name of the account.

balance.description: The balance of the account. Can be null if the balance is not available or not applicable for this account type.

SyncGeneralLedgerBalanceRequest.description: Request body for synchronizing general ledger balances from an external system.

requestId.description: A unique identifier for this synchronization request. This can be used for idempotency or tracing.

timestamp.description: The timestamp when these general ledger balances were generated or last updated in the source system (ISO 8601 format).

balances.description: A list of individual general ledger account balances.

SyncGeneralLedgerBalanceReceipt.description: Receipt details for a general ledger balance synchronization request, indicating the overall outcome of the batch operation.

requestId.description: The unique identifier of the original synchronization request. This UUID was provided by the client as the idempotency key for this batch operation.

id.description: The unique UUID generated by the **finance system** for this synchronized general ledger balance batch.

action.description: The overall action taken on the general ledger balances.
